Player History
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 3/4/1989 to a minor league deal...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/3/1991, off David Wells (TOR)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/13/1991, off Storm Davis (DET)...

Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1991, hitting .319 with 32 HR, 115 RBI...
